name: Rider vs Arnold
description:
It appears meat meets rubber, as the strange stance switching highway king finally meets his match! Battle the knuckle bearing, ladder climbing infinity boxer and try not to let him punch a hole through your chest. Experience:

- A tense, realistic battle!

- Use all of Rider's skills to your advantage!

- More drug trips!

- A unique dialogue system!

Credits to AAA, the Pointless team and the Hopeful team for their hard work. And Austin Jorgenson.
